title: Introduction
body: Welcome to the course introduction! In this short section you will find the course learning objectives, a video about how to use the course and a short animation about the course creator.

_graphic.alt: Image of Steven, the course instructor, saying Welcome.

title: Module 1
body: In this module you will learn the basics of nutrition.

title: Lesson 1: Nutrients
body: Welcome to Lesson 1! Here you will learn all about nutrients!

_graphic.alt: Image of George and Steven inspecting food for nutrients.

title: Lesson 2: Energy and Nutrition Labels
body: Welcome to Lesson 2! Here you will learn all about energy (calories) and how to interpret nutrition labels.

_graphic.alt: Image of Steven teaching Nuala and Maureen about energy and nutrition labels.

title: Module 2
body: In this module you will learn about the Mediterranean Diet and how to create a meal plan for a week.

title: Lesson 3: The Mediterranean Diet
body: Welcome to Lesson 3! Here you will learn all about the benefits of the Mediterranean Diet and the foods that make up the Mediterranean diet.

_graphic.alt: Image of Steven in the kitchen with Jacinta and Trevor.

title: Lesson 4: Meal Planning
body: Welcome to Lesson 4! Here you will learn about the benefits of meal planning and how to create a meal plan for a week.

_graphic.alt: Image of Steven shopping with Dave and Terry.
